featured.text: The passage indicates that dead mail auctions are held .
When a lot of dead mail has piled up, the dead mail offices hold public auctions.

definition.zh_def: 拍賣，一種出售物品的方式，通常通過競標來決定價格。
definition.en_def: A public sale in which goods or property are sold to the highest bidder.
definition.example: She bought a beautiful painting at the auction.
